name: Food-Finder
description: An app to help people decide where to eat

scripts.installit: npm install && cd test_2 && npx create-react-app the-app
scripts.setuppc: cd test_2 && cd the-app && rmdir /Q /S src && mkdir src
scripts.setupunix: cd test_2 && cd the-app && rm -rf src && mkdir src
scripts.runit: cd test_2 && cd the-app && npm start

author: Tika
